snippet: The documentary “Divorce Corp.” argues that lawyers and courts collude to make divorces as expensive and drawn-out as possible.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews documentary film Divorce Corp, directed by Joseph Sorge.
lead_paragraph: The documentary “Divorce Corp.” argues that lawyers and courts collude to make divorces as expensive and drawn-out as possible.

headline.seo: ‘Divorce Corp.,’ a Documentary by Joseph Sorge
headline.main: Splitsville, a Land of Diabolical Lawyers
